citation.title: Conflicting Family Values in Mutual Fund Families

news.title: SAFT ON WEALTH-Fund firms with more competition outperform: James Saft
news.summary: Published: 21:43 BST, 30 August 2017 | Updated: 21:43 BST, 30 August 2017 By James Saft Aug 30 (Reuters) - Unpleasant it may be, but investors do better if the mutual funds they hold are managed by companies with an ethos more like that of a viper…

news.title: Fund firms with more competition outperform: James Saft - Times of India
news.summary: (James Saft is a Reuters columnist. The opinions expressed are his own) By James Saft Aug 30 (Reuters) - Unpleasant it may be, but investors do better if the mutual funds they hold are managed by companies with an ethos more like that of a viper pit…

news.title: Fund Firms With More Competition Outperform: James Saft
news.summary: By James Saft (Reuters) - Unpleasant it may be, but investors do better if the mutual funds they hold are managed by companies with an ethos more like that of a viper pit than a kindergarten.
